attributes.action: Require all manufacturers to use packaging which is %100 recyclable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have had enough of searching on the back of packaging only to find that the packet can't be recycled.
Once consumed of course I'm not that sad

rejection.details:
This petiton overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/manufacturers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
